mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_ID, C.MEMBER_ID, C.PROD_ID, C.CART_QTY, C.REG_DATE, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, P.PROD_SELLER FROM CART_DB C JOIN PRODUCT_DB P ON C.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY C.REG_DATE DESC
SELECT CART_ID as cartId, MEMBER_ID as memberId, PROD_ID as prodId, CART_QTY as cartQty, REG_DATE as regDate FROM CART_DB WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART_DB (CART_ID, MEMBER_ID, PROD_ID, CART_QTY, REG_DATE) VALUES (CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{prodId}, #{cartQty}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART_DB WHERE CART_ID = #{cartId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
